content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment in München very attractive. Let's start with the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in your apartment. I believe the location is very convenient, and the size is suitable for me. I am looking to negotiate the best price possible. Could you please provide me with your initial asking price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate your interest in my apartment. As a landlord, I am always looking to provide the best living experience for my tenants. However, I must ensure that I am compensated fairly for the investment I have made. Let's start with the rental price. I am looking for a monthly rent of 1,200 Euros. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your asking price is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student and have a limited budget. I was hoping to find something more affordable. Is there any room for negotiation on the price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, as a student, I understand that you may have a limited budget. However, the location and amenities of my apartment are quite attractive. The monthly rent of 1,200 Euros is a fair price considering the benefits you will enjoy. Is there any price you are considering that would fit your budget better?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your understanding of my situation. I am willing to pay a competitive price for the apartment, but 1,200 Euros is still out of my budget. I was hoping to find something closer to 900 Euros per month. Is there any way we can meet in the middle?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, your counter-offer of 900 Euros is significantly lower than my asking price. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must maintain a certain level of profitability for my investment. Let's try to find a middle ground. How about 1,050 Euros per month? This is a fair compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 1,050 Euros is more reasonable, and I am willing to consider it. However, I would like to have some time to think about it and compare it with other options I am considering. Would it be possible for us to discuss this further after I have had time to reflect?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo Wang. I understand that you need time to consider your options. Please take your time, and we can discuss this further at a later date. If you have any further questions or if you decide to proceed with the offer, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will consider your offer and get back to you soon. Is there any way I can contact you if I have further questions or if I decide to proceed?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You are welcome, Yi-Nuo Wang. I am looking forward to your response. You can contact me directly at this number or via email at [email protected]. Please let me know how you decide to proceed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
